summary.title: StellarPay Threat Model
summary.description: Threat model for StellarPayâ€™s web-based digital banking platform using STRIDE.

threats.title: Tampering
threats.mitigation:
Use HTTPS
Rate-limit login attempts
Encrypt credentials in transit

threats.title: Information Disclosure
threats.mitigation:
Tokenize card data
Encrypt in transit & at rest
Validate all inputs

threats.title: Tampering
threats.mitigation:
End-to-end validation
Input sanitization
Anti-fraud algorithms

threats.title: Information disclosure
threats.mitigation:
Audit logs with time stamps
Secure log storage
Use write-once log store

threats.title: Information disclosure
threats.mitigation:
Role-based access control (RBAC)
Encrypt responses
Log all access
